description: Enforce correct model parameters on Gemini and Codex MCP tool calls

hooks.prompt:
You are about to call a Gemini MCP tool. CRITICAL: Check if you included the `model` parameter.

Required models:
- ask-gemini: model="gemini-3-flash-preview" (quick) or model="gemini-3-pro-preview" (deep)
- brainstorm: model="gemini-3-pro-preview" (always)

If you did NOT specify a model parameter, you MUST block this call and retry with the correct model. The default (gemini-2.5-pro) is outdated.

Decide: approve if model is specified, block if model is missing.

You are about to call a Codex MCP tool. CRITICAL: Check if you included the `model` parameter.

Required models:
- Deep analysis: model="gpt-5.1-codex-max"
- Agentic tasks: model="gpt-5.2-codex"
- Quick checks: model="gpt-5.1-codex-mini"

If you did NOT specify a model parameter, you MUST block this call and retry with the correct model.

Decide: approve if model is specified, block if model is missing.
